trans-unit.source: Represents a dynamic update map query.
This class supports the versioning and dynamic update functionality of Windows Workflow Foundation.
[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] workflow versioning, workflow identity, and dynamic update, see the following topics.
[Workflow Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=271561) Describes the workflow versioning functionality introduced in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
[Dynamic Update](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271563) Describes how to update the workflow definition of a persisted workflow instance by using dynamic update.

[Using WorkflowApplication Identity and Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271564) Describes how to use <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowIdentity> to host multiple versions of a workflow side-by-side.
[Side by Side Versioning in WorkflowServiceHost](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271565) Describes how to host multiple versions of a workflow on a single endpoint.

[How to: Host Multiple Versions of a Workflow Side-by-Side](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271566) This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating a workflow definition, and hosting workflows using both the old and new definition at the same time.

[How to: Update the Definition of a Running Workflow Instance](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271567) This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating persisted workflow instances to use a new workflow definition.
Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapQuery"></xref> can update while running.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapQuery"></xref> can update while running; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Searches for the match with <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapQuery"></xref> using the specified activities.
The activity to be searched for a match.
Searches for the match with <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapQuery"></xref> using the specified variable.
The variable to be searched for a match.
